en-US.label.confim.text: Do you really want to remove the selected conversations? This action is irreversable.
en-US.error.auth: You are not authorised to perform this action.
en-US.error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred, we apologise for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
en-US.error.draft.save: An error occured while saving your draft. Please try again later.
en-US.error.draft.send: An error occured while sending your draft. Please try again later.
en-US.error.conversation.save-reply: An error occured while replying to conversation. Your message has not been sent. Please try again later.
en-US.error.conversation.send-reply: An error occured while replying to conversation. Your message has not been sent. Please try again later.
en-US.error.conversation.remove: An error occured while removing some of selected conversations.
